about.title: About AAHD
about.description1: The Argentine Association of Digital Humanities (AAHD) is an open community of practice whose objective is to promote research, transmission and dissemination of knowledge in the field of Digital Humanities, building bridges between different disciplines and lines of research.
about.description2: Digital Humanities do not constitute a thematic discipline but rather a set of procedures that cross our areas of interest.
about.description3: Indeed, although digital technologies are present today in the different stages of research processes about textual, discursive, symbolic and cultural productions (search, dissemination, access and storage of information), Digital Humanities propose overcoming this simple instrumental use.

digital_turn.title: Digital Turn
digital_turn.description: We are interested in reflecting on the impact of digitization on Humanities research and teaching.

data.title: Data
data.description: Data as culture, the culture of data, and contextualized data for proper understanding.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We are a community of practice that explores new forms of work and collaboration in the Humanities.

humanities.title: Humanities
humanities.description: Our starting point for thinking and doing research with digital media are the Human Sciences.

open.title: Open
open.description: We are challenged by new ways of doing research with open data and methodologies.

processes.title: Processes
processes.description: We seek to identify, document and give greater visibility to processes, not just research results.

twitter.title: Tweets by aahdArg
twitter.description: Follow us on Twitter for the latest news

mailing.title: Mailing List
mailing.description: Receive all the news by email.

footer.copyright: Argentine Association of Digital Humanities. All rights reserved.

community.title: Argentine Association of Digital Humanities
community.description: We are a community of practice and our goal is to function as a node for Digital Humanities. Do you want to be part of our community and connect with digital humanists? You just need to complete this form.
community.members_description: In this table you will find details of the people who make up our community, with a brief biography and their interests.
